verses.name: Joshua 9:7
verses.text: And the men of Israel said unto the Hivites, Peradventure ye dwell among us; and how shall we make a league with you?

verses.name: Joshua 9:8
verses.text: And they said unto Joshua, We are thy servants. And Joshua said unto them, Who are ye? and from whence come ye?

verses.name: Joshua 9:9
verses.text: And they said unto him, From a very far country thy servants are come because of the name of the Lord thy God: for we have heard the fame of him, and all that he did in Egypt,
